About Us & Milestones

Southeast Asia Network Corporation Limited (SEA NET) as a firm, is an Information Technology systems integrator
â€“ specializing in delivering technology solutions to fulfill the needs of our clients.

From 2000 up until this day we continue to serve our clients in many industries.

  • 2000

    Our Start

    SEA NET was incorporated in September 2000 with the aim to become a qualified software company providing complete IT solutions for clients.

  • 2009

    CMMI Accreditation

    To become so, SEA NET has undertaken the Capability Maturity Model for Software (CMM-SW) scheme of Software Engineering Institution (SEI), Carnegie Mellon University, and achieved CMMI Level 3 in 2009.

  • 2015

    TravelON & TravelONE

    Noticing the growth within the Tourism industry in Thailand, we embarked on developing a one-stop back office system for travel agencies looking to automate and digitally manage and analyze their data.

  • 2020

    Continuing to serve

    Through accumulated experience and expertise in this field, SEA NET to this very day continues to serve its clients with integrity and the intention to provide the highest quality of service and solutions.

Our Team & Office

SEA NET is an established company with the office being at 4 Soi 2 Seree 7, Rama 9 rd., Suanluang, Bangkok 10250, Thailand.
